## HelpBubbleBuilderOptions.active property

Whether the help bubble starts in active state (default: false).

**Signature:**

```typescript
active?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

When active, the help bubble receives keyboard input for scrolling. When inactive, it ignores input messages.
